feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: third party development boards in Arduino IDE

link.title: third party development boards in Arduino IDE

entry.content:
Errors like A fatal error occurred: Failed to connect to ESP32: No serial data received.

Borderless Electronics – Arduino Leonardo – /dev/ttyACM0

Keyestudio ESP32 Plus Development Board – ESP32-WROOM-DA Module – /dev/ttyUSB0 – https://dl.espressif.com/dl/package_esp32_index.json

Adafruit Feather HUZZAH with ESP8266 – Adafruit Feather HUZZAH ESP8266 – /dev/ttyUSB0 – http://arduino.esp8266.com/stable/package_esp8266com_index.json

Seeed Studio XIAO ESP32C3 – XIAO_ESP32C3 – /dev/ttyACM0 – https://files.seeedstudio.com/arduino/package_seeeduino_boards_index.json
entry.summary: a detailed tutorial on setting up Arduino alternatives
